com.castlabs.android.subtitles

Interface SubtitlesPreview

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SubtitlesStyleObserver

    public interface SubtitlesPreview
extends SubtitlesStyleObserver
    Implementations of this interface provide a view that can render a preview of a given subtitle text.
    Since:
    3.1.0
